programme.title: Lord of War, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar winner Nicolas Cage stars in this taut, action-packed tale of a notorious arms dealer who sold weapons to dictators and successfully outran the law for nearly twenty years.

programme.desc: In this neo-noir crime film, an undercover cop (Sean Penn) comes back to his old neighborhood in New York City's Hell's Kitchen to bring down the Irish Mafia, which is now led by two of his childhood friends (Gary Oldman and Ed Harris).

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Fights a Battle in Extreme Heat!

programme.title: Bartolomeo recounts the formation of the Straw Hats, sharing their moving story with the rest of his crew! Meanwhile, the mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. But when the haze clears, no one is expecting what they see!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Curtain-up on a New Adventure! Arriving at the Phantom Island, Zou!

programme.title: Luffy and the others arrive at the mysterious land of Zou, and find the Sunny. But when they board, they find the other Straw Hats have already disembarked. Thus, Luffy, Zoro, Robin and the others take on the challenge of climbing the monstrous elephant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The New Warlord! The Legendary Whitebeard's Son Appears!

programme.title: Finally scaling the elephant's back, the Straw Hats continue their search for the other half of their crew! But the mysterious "island" on the back of the elephant may hold more danger than they bargained for, as they learn they are not alone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Elephant Climb! A Great Adventure on the Back of the Giant Elephant!

programme.title: Luffy pushes deeper into the mysterious forest on the elephant's back, but he's treading in territory where is not welcome! Meanwhile, Usopp and the others make a startling discovery in a ruined city!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle Begins! Luffy vs. the Mink Tribe!

programme.title: Luffy and the others survive the Rain-Ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and the others are unexpectedly welcomed at the fortress and treated well by the Minks, although they have to navigate some cultural differencesâ¦ And Nami starts sharing what happened to them after they left Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Start to Counterattack! Great Moves by the Twirly Hat Crew!

programme.title: Luffy and the others learn about the dangerous intruders who have come to Zou, and why the island is wrecked! Afterwards, Luffy's loose lips get them into trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Threat Descends! The Beast Pirates, Jack!

programme.title: Duke Dogstorm - the Straw Hats finally meet the ruler of this strange land, and learn more about the battle that took place here; and the mysterious system by which the island is ruled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Day! Duke Dogstorm Appears!

programme.title: Day turns to night as the Minks keep up their onslaught against the invading Beast Pirates! But Jack's amazing Devil Fruit power may end the elephant island once and for all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Night! Master Cat Viper Emerges!

programme.title: Night and day, Jack faces the fury of the two sworn defenders of Zou, but while they put up a good fight, the Minks aren't able to subdue Jack, especially after he brings out his secret weapon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Exterminated Capital! The Twirly Hat Crew Arrive!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Jack's deadly attack on the island of Zou, Chopper and Sanji rush in to save the fallen Mink Tribe - but they will need the help of Caesar to overcome the poisonous effects of the gas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time Limit Closes in! The Bond Between the Mink Tribe and the Crew!

programme.title: More of the dramatic happenings on Zou are revealed as we learn that Jack's pirate band were not the only visitors to the elephant island! And what about the mysterious fate of Sanji?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Delinquent Comes Home! Emperor Big Mom's Assassins!

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Failure to Communicate
programme.desc: Michaels parents come to visit him, but he is worried about the way they treat each other and how it reflects on his own children; after a disastrous attempt to fix things, Michael and Jay decide to let things the way they are.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Papa Said Knock You Out
programme.desc: Junior asks Michael for boxing lessons so he can protect his sisters honor.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Return of the Wall
programme.desc: Michael steps in to save Kadys soccer team from Janets overbearing coaching style.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Working Relationship
programme.desc: Michael seeks advice from Junior on how to handle Janets office persona; the cast re-enacts scenes from the movie E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Big Bold Sandwiches
programme.desc: In this episode Yo-Yo is laying out big bold sandwiches so come hungry. First she builds the showstopper of all subs. Its the perfect sandwich for all types of gatherings, from a Friday night chill out to laying out the best food for a game day.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Meatless Mondays
programme.desc: Our girl Yo-Yo gets in the kitchen with one of Hollywoods leading men. This healthy meal is a plant based delight. She starts off with a charred cauliflower steak with a creamy baby bella mushroom gravy.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - The Power of Resilience
programme.desc: Learning how the way one rises from challenges is what defines them.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Keep It on the Short Grass
programme.desc: Bernie creates a public relations disaster while facing off with Matt Damon and Lucy Lawless in a charity golf tournament.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Sweet Home Chicago
programme.desc: Bernie takes the entire family to Chicago for the funeral of a beloved uncle, but his cousins (Don Cheadle) scheming mars the trip.

programme.title: Best Mattress Topper Ever!
programme.desc: Back Pain? Hip? Sleep well thanks to this cooling topper!

programme.title: The Aging Brain
programme.desc: Learn whats behind mental decline with age, and how to improve memory, focus and concentration with NeuroQs Darrin Peterson and Dale Bredesen MD.

programme.title: Protect Your Family from Identity Theft
programme.desc: Every 5 seconds theres a victim of identity theft. LifeLock helps alert you, restore your identity, and reimburse lost funds-leading the way in protecting families every day.

programme.title: NEW! Shark PowerDetect with DuoClean Detect Technology
programme.desc: Meet the new Shark PowerDetect Upright Vacuum with features like DuoClean Detect Technology, self-cleaning brush roll and odor neutralizing and you will be cleaning faster, smarter and better!

programme.title: Best Mattress Topper Ever!
programme.desc: Back Pain? Hip? Sleep well thanks to this cooling topper!

programme.title: Never Scrub Your Floors Again
programme.desc: See why this cleaning tool replaces chemicals and hard labor!

programme.title: Protect Your Family from Identity Theft
programme.desc: Every 5 seconds theres a victim of identity theft. LifeLock helps alert you, restore your identity, and reimburse lost funds-leading the way in protecting families every day.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - Childhood Interrupted
programme.desc: Coming of age is not easy.

programme.title: Hustle, Sizzle, and Smoke - Whole Chicken and Fennel
programme.desc: Chef Don goes toe to toe with Chef Al; todays challenge focuses on the components of whole chicken paired with fennel; the pitmasters must artfully integrate Flo wine into their dish.

programme.title: Hustle, Sizzle, and Smoke - Sausage and Tomato
programme.desc: Chef Jazzuri and Chef Stanzee throw down in the semifinal match; sausage and tomato are on the menu today, but the contestants must also integrate blackberry Merlot jam into their dishes.

programme.title: Hustle, Sizzle, and Smoke - Pork Belly and Rice
programme.desc: The first round of the finals has arrived; Chef Stanzee faces off against Chef Al; the challenge is cooking up pork belly with a side of rice.

programme.title: Hustle, Sizzle, and Smoke - Vegan BBQ and Mango
programme.desc: Stanzee and Al look to seal their win and leave it all out in the arena; vegan BBQ with a side of mango is on the menu.

programme.title: Love Me or Leave Me
programme.desc: A reckless teenager ditches her infant twins and scoots off to someplace, only to return into their lives years later when they have grown up into adults with issues.

programme.title: Steps of Faith
programme.desc: Mocked by her family for opening a hippotherapy farm for children, Faith questions her message from God after a child is nearly injured and the work is overwhelming.

programme.title: The Machinist (2004)
programme.desc: Cryptic notes and encounters with a mysterious stranger torment a drill-press operator (Christian Bale) who has not slept in a year.

programme.title: Wolves (2016)

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane (2016)

programme.title: Joe Dirt (2001)

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: American Renegades (2017)
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: Top Gun (1986)
programme.desc: For Lieutenant Pete "Maverick" Mitchell and his friend and co-pilot Nick "Goose" Bradshaw, being accepted into an elite training school for fighter pilots is a dream come true. But a tragedy will threaten Petes dreams of becoming an ace pilot.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick (2022)
programme.desc: Pete "Maverick" Mitchell keeps pushing the envelope after years of service as one of the Navys top aviators. He must soon confront the past while training a new squad of graduates for a dangerous mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: Jack Reacher (2012)
programme.desc: A defense attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.desc: Jack Ryan (Ben Affleck) and the CIA director (Morgan Freeman) try to stop terrorists who are planning a nuclear attack.

programme.title: The Contractor (2022)

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn (1996)

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldnt refuse.

programme.title: Shell (2024)

programme.title: Sinister (2012)
programme.desc: A true-crime novelist (Ethan Hawke) and his family become the targets of a supernatural entity when he uses found footage to unravel the murders of his homes previous occupants.

programme.title: Barrons Cove (2024)
programme.desc: A man with a violent past kidnaps the boy he holds responsible for his sons death. As he grows closer to uncovering the truth, hes left to wonder whether his pursuers are really seeking to protect the boy, or merely the secrets he keeps.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.sub-title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.desc: After serving time for a crime he did not commit, a vengeful barber (Johnny Depp) and his accomplice (Helena Bonham Carter) carve up unlucky customers and bake them in meat pies.

programme.title: Fight or Flight (2024)
programme.desc: A mercenary takes on the job of tracking a high-value asset known only as "The Ghost" on an international flight. Realizing the plane is filled with assassins assigned to kill them both, the pair must work together in a fight for their lives.

programme.title: Twisted (2004)
programme.desc: With help from her partner (Andy Garcia), a police inspector (Ashley Judd) searches for a killer who is murdering her former lovers.

programme.title: Wildcat (2021)
programme.desc: A captive reporter must figure out a way to escape from the militants who ambushed her convoy in the Middle East.

programme.title: Mourning in Lod (2023)
programme.desc: The fates of three families become inextricably intertwined when a Palestinian citizen is killed by a Jewish settler in the city of Lod, Israel, and deadly riots break out.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: A mans life collapses when his mistress is found dead in his pool. Terrified of the consequences and desperate to protect his family, he conceals the truth, triggering a chaotic night that threatens to unravel his perfect life.

programme.title: The Survivalist (2021)
programme.desc: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man (2017)
programme.desc: A couple (Douglas Smith, Cressida Bonas) and their friend (Lucien Laviscount) stumble upon the horrific origins of the Bye Bye Man (Doug Jones), a mysterious figure that they discover is the root cause of the evil behind the most unspeakable acts.

programme.title: The Beldham (2024)
